page.title: 14BODFARI FARM_ MAKING SILAGE
page.content: On any farm the feeding of the animals is very important.On a dairy farm the quality of the milk is dependant on the health of the cattle.During the warmer months the cattle graze in the fields,supplemented by 'cake' containing 16% protein .During the winter months the herd is kept indoors and fed on silage. Silage is made in summer when the grass is cut.It is usually cut in the afternoon when the sugar is at its highest.It is left for twenty four hours before being collected into big bales which weigh about half a ton. These are then stored in large plastic bags and will be used as winter feed.
